title: opportunity Details

xdm:opportunityName.title: Opportunity Name
xdm:opportunityName.description: Subject or descriptive name, such as the expected order or company name, for the opportunity.

xdm:externalID.title: External ID
xdm:externalID.description: External unique identifier reference like sfdc id,dynamicsid etc to help identify and deduplicate if and when needed.

xdm:accountID.title: Account ID
xdm:accountID.description: Account unique identifier reference that this opportunity is linked to.

xdm:opportunityType.title: Opportunity Type
xdm:opportunityType.description: Opportunity type such as Existing Business or New Business

xdm:opportunityDescription.title: Opportunity Description
xdm:opportunityDescription.description: Additional information to describe the opportunity, such as possible products to sell or past purchases from the customer.

xdm:stage.title: Opportunity Stage
xdm:stage.description: Sales stage of this opportunity to aid the sales team in their efforts to win this opportunity.

xdm:fiscalYear.title: Fiscal Year
xdm:fiscalYear.description: The fiscal year this opportunity is targeted.

xdm:fiscalQuarter.title: Fiscal Quarter
xdm:fiscalQuarter.description: The fiscal quarter this opportunity is targeted..

xdm:forecastCategory.title: Forecast Category
xdm:forecastCategory.description: Forecast Category determined by the opportunity Stage value eg: omitted,pipeline,bestcase,commit,closed.

xdm:forecastCategoryName.title: Forecast Category Name
xdm:forecastCategoryName.description: Forecast category name that is displayed in reports for a perticular forecast category.

xdm:isClosed.title: Closed Flag
xdm:isClosed.description: Flag indicating if this opportunity is closed.

xdm:isWon.title: Won Flag
xdm:isWon.description: Flag indicating if this opportunity is Won.

xdm:probabilityPercentage.title: Probability Percentage
xdm:probabilityPercentage.description: Likelihood that opportunity will close, stated as a percentage.

xdm:expectedRevenue.title: Expected Revenue
xdm:expectedRevenue.description: Calculated revenue based on the Amount and Probability.

xdm:opportunityQuantity.title: Opportunity Quantity
xdm:opportunityQuantity.description: Total of all quantity field values for all products in the Products related list for this opportunity.

xdm:closeDate.title: Close Date
xdm:closeDate.description: Date of closure for this opportunity.

xdm:lastActivityDate.title: Last Activity Date
xdm:lastActivityDate.description: Last activity date for this opportunity.

xdm:leadSource.title: Lead Source
xdm:leadSource.description: Source of the opportunity such as Advertisement, Partner, or Web.

xdm:nextStep.title: Next Step
xdm:nextStep.description: Description of next task in closing opportunity.

xdm:isDeleted.title: Deleted Flag
xdm:isDeleted.description: Flag indicating if this opportunity is deleted.
